content.description: SDS/Squat start in the dry mini waterfall. Traverse right on slopers, crimps, heel hooks and compression to the finish of Mud Weight. Don't Dab on the Tree. If you like sloper lip problems, this is a good one. Follow #1 in the Photo Description.
content.location: Left side of the boulder in a mini waterfall/slide.

content.description: SDS in brown rock and climb up to topout on the lip via pockets and iron crimps.
content.location: Right side of the vertical wall 6-8ft left of a skinny tree.

content.description: SDS on a jug ear. Move to a R-Hand sidepull crimp and deadpoint to the iron ear. Topout straight up.
content.location: Tallest part of the vertical wall just right of the tree.

content.description: Lip traverse starting on the far right and traversing left to topout at Pit Bull. Good first warmup for the area.
Legit Jump Start to matched pinch. Campus to lip and topout
content.location: Jumpstart in the middle of the wave feature. This is also the topout to Hydrocollodial.

content.description: This is the one of the most classic climbs in The Gasfields, Stand start matched on a crimp/undercling solution pocket. Get your feet up onto the kicker, L-Hand to a small crimper and go to the bass mouth break. Check the swing and campus or core up and keep your feet on and throw up and left to a crimper pocket slot and then move left into the topout of Mud Weight/ Solids Control.
content.location: Stand start on the right side of the wave feature with both hands matched on a crimper/undercling pocket

content.description: Start matched on a crimper/undercling pocket, L-hand to a small crimp and then move to the break. Take the easier exit right out of the bass mouth slot to the lip and mantle/roll over for the top out.
content.location: Start the same as Low Gravs but take the easier exit and move right out the overhang to the finish on an easier Southern mantle rollover.

content.description: SDS on iron banded crimps in the white lichen and move up and slightly right to the lip on positive holds and good feet.
content.location: Middle of the vertical wall in the white lichen.

content.description: SDS/Squat start on iron band crimps and head straight up.
content.location: Starts on the right side of of the wave feature and the transition to vertical

content.description: Overhanging wave feature on fine grained sandstone. All problems top out.
